title: A Picture Perfect Deal: Save 40% Off the Editors' Choice-Winning Photoshop Elements
description: Adobe Photoshop Elements provides a quick solution for design hobbyists. You can now grab a three-year license for $40 less in today's deal.
content:
If you're a beginner or novice in the photo-editing space , sometimes Photoshop's full suite of features may seem intimidating. It can also be quite expensive, especially if you're not planning to use all of them. That's where Photoshop Elements comes in. It's a lighter version than Photoshop, but it provides the essentials for novice photo editors. It has also earned our Editors' Choice award for enthusiast-level photo-editing software. Over at Newegg, you can grab a 3-year subscription at a 40% discount, bringing the final price down from $99.99 to $59.99. As an added bonus, you can take an additional $15 off using a promo code. This kind of combination doesn't pop up too often, so don't miss out on this deal!

Photoshop Elements has handy features such as the AI-Powered Remove Tool, which lets you remove unwanted objects you paint over and replace them with generated background content, making it more efficient compared to manual removal methods. You can also combine photos and use the subject from one picture as the background of a second picture, all without having to use a green screen. Another useful feature is being able to use the automatic selection tool to choose objects in pictures, pick a color, and then change it to your selected color instantly. This can be incredibly helpful in creating different color versions of product mockups or simply just enhancing the picture.

Our principal software writer, Michael Muchmore, awarded the software an "Excellent" rating. In our Photoshop Elements review , he said, "A top photo-editing application for hobbyists, Adobe Photoshop Elements offers many advanced capabilities and AI features in a simplified interface." With this standing ovation, act fast!

Be sure to check out our other Newegg deals and photo-editing software coverage .

summary: The Newegg has offered a 40% discount on the Editors' Choice-winning Photoshop Elements, a lighter version of Photoshop that provides essential features for novice photo editors. The software, which has also won our Editors’ Choice award for enthusiast-level photo-editing software, includes the AI-Powered Remove Tool, which removes unwanted objects from the paint and replaces them with generated background content. The final price is $59.99, with an additional $15 off using a special promo code. The deal is available at Newegg.
shortSummary: A 40% discount of 40% offers Newegg's Photoshop Elements, offering essential photo-editing tools for novice photo editors, including AI-Pollen removal tools and a 3-year subscription.
argos_summary: Photoshop Elements offers a simplified, affordable alternative to Photoshop with AI-powered tools like the Remove Tool and automatic selection, making it ideal for hobbyists. A Newegg deal cuts the 3‑year subscription from $99.99 to $59.99, plus an extra $15 off with a promo code. The software earned an “Excellent” rating from Michael Muchmore and is highlighted alongside other photo‑editing deals on Amazon, Walmart, and Target.
